snippet: The Marine Corps Special Operations Command apologized on Friday for a Tweet that appeared to make light of the assassination of the Rev. Dr. Martin Luther King Jr., urging its followers not to be a “lone shooter” over the holiday weekend. Dr....
abstract: The Marine Corps Special Operations Command apologized on Friday for a Tweet that appeared to make light of the assassination of the Rev. Dr. Martin Luther King Jr., urging its followers not to be a “lone shooter” over the holiday weekend. Dr. King was assassinated by a gunman in 1968.

headline.main: Marine Corps Apologizes for Gunman Reference in Martin Luther King Jr. Holiday Tweet
